content: SAO PAULO Argentine online marketplace Mercadolibre Inc is diving into areas like lending and logistics management  which once belonged exclusively to large financial and retail groups  to increase market share in Brazil  a top executive said.

title: Mercadolibre to debut lending  logistics services in Brazil

content: SAO PAULO  April 14 Latin American e-commerce company MercadoLibre Inc said on Tuesday it agreed to buy Brazilian software firm KPL Soluções for at least 50 million reais ($16 million)  adding 80 employees and expertise in software for online retailers.
name: MercadoLibre Inc
title: MercadoLibre agrees to buy Brazilian software developer
